explanation: [0-0] A long-haired man with green skin wearing a blue shirt stares with wide eyes. In front of him is the black subtitle "Hulk Becomes NPC."

[0-5] Then the green-skinned man in the blue shirt opens his mouth wide to speak. The camera then cuts to a man in a red shirt lying on a black sofa under a yellow blanket. Immediately afterward, the man in the red shirt wakes up with a terrified expression. The camera switches back to the green-skinned man in the blue shirt, who keeps bumping into the white wall to his left while talking. The camera then cuts to the man in the red shirt smiling and shooting spider silk from his right wrist. Immediately, the green-skinned man in the blue shirt is pinned to the white wall by a spider web. He turns his head, eyes wide open, and speaks.
